aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.description: VacApp is a mobile application created for farmers and veterinarians in Peru. Our mission is to facilitate livestock management through an accessible platform, even for those without prior technological experience. From animal registration to report generation, VacApp is made for you.
aboutus.subtitle: Connecting livestock tradition with technological solutions.
